file_content.text: When my son struck me down, I refused to surrender to mortality.
When you helped my son strike me down, I refused to surrender to mortality.
My spirit invaded your mind in search of a new host. You resisted.
Locked in your mind, I conducted experiments to sate my curiosity.
I offered you my power, and you accepted.
I offered you my power, and you refused.
I pushed you to defy Arcann, and you finally ended his life.
I pushed you to defy Arcann, but instead you recruited him.
I urged you to hunt Vaylin. And when she threatened your life, I made her "kneel before the dragon of Zakuul."
In time, my curiosity eroded--and a plan began to take shape.
By striking her down, you unleashed her spirit--and gave me the key to your ruin...
I pretended to abandon you on Odessen, but my departure was a ruse.
Trapped in your mind, I silently observed how you behaved in my absence.
Your strength grew. Your vulnerabilities festered.
I would hollow out your mind, take possession of your body, and ascend to the Eternal Throne.
But first, I required new weapons to conquer your psyche.
